mapper.select: select * from [OutBill],[ItemsOut],[Goods],[Department],[Category],[Summary] where [ItemsOut].OutBillID=[OutBill].OutBillID and [ItemsOut].GoodsID=[Goods].GoodsID and [ItemsOut].DepartmentID=[Department].DepartmentID and [Goods].CategoryID=[Category].CategoryID and [Goods].GoodsID=[Summary].GoodsID
